00054         public void SendMail(string Message)
00055         {
00056             try
00057             {
00058                 System.Net.Mail.MailMessage message = new System.Net.Mail.MailMessage();
00059                 char[] Splitter = { ',' };
00060                 string[] AddressCollection = to.Split(Splitter);
00061                 for (int x = 0; x < AddressCollection.Length; ++x)
00062                 {
00063                     message.To.Add(AddressCollection[x]);
00064                 }
00065                 message.Subject = subject;
00066                 message.From = new System.Net.Mail.MailAddress((from));
00067                 message.Body = Message;
00068                 message.Priority = Priority_;
00069                 message.SubjectEncoding = System.Text.Encoding.GetEncoding("ISO-8859-1");
00070                 message.BodyEncoding = System.Text.Encoding.GetEncoding("ISO-8859-1");
00071                 message.IsBodyHtml = true;
00072                 if (Attachment_ != null)
00073                 {
00074                     message.Attachments.Add(Attachment_);
00075                 }
00076                 System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient smtp = new System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient(Server,Port);
00077                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00078                 {
00079                     smtp.Credentials = new System.Net.NetworkCredential(UserName,Password);
00080                 }
00081                 smtp.Send(message);
00082                 message.Dispose();
00083             }
00084             catch (Exception e)
00085             {
00086                 throw new Exception(e.ToString());
00087             }
00088         }
00089 
00094         public void SendMailAsync(string Message)
00095         {
00096             ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(delegate { SendMail(Message); });
00097         }
